recipesJson.name: Summer Cream
recipesJson.author: Seakow
recipesJson.description: Ayvaluv11 asked me if I had any ideas for a custard with Medicine Flower Wild Raspberry and this what I came up with. I think it still needs some tweaking, but is pretty good as is.

reviews.text: Thanks Seakow for putting the effort into this, that means a lot !  Will mix this up tomorrow. You and others have all just been absolutely wonderful on here and so helpful in the great raspberry quest ! Love to you all !
